settings.title: Settings
settings.subTroubleshoot: Check for common issues and solutions
settings.aboutAppDialog:
Version: 1.0.0

Developed by: hctaskiran / Sagredina

This app is a web-based frontend for the PS3 webMAN MOD. It allows you to manage your PS3 system, games, and more.

controller.rotate: Rotate the device in order to use the controller

gameCommands.subReload: Reload game in case of freeze or any other issue
gameCommands.subQuit: Quit game and return to XMB
gameCommands.subRescan: Rescan games and refresh XMB list
gameCommands.subMount: Search for game by text and mount it
gameCommands.subEject: Eject physically disc from the console

internet.subBrowser: Open web browser and redirect to specified URL
